snippet: Marcus Mabry, editor of Rendezvous, speaks with Rachel Donadio in Vatican City about the election of Jorge Mario Bergoglio, 76, a Jesuit and Latin American, to be called Pope Francis, and with Ian Fisher about the cardinals’ choice.
abstract: Marcus Mabry, editor of Rendezvous, speaks with Rachel Donadio in Vatican City about the election of Jorge Mario Bergoglio, 76, a Jesuit and Latin American, to be called Pope Francis, and with Ian Fisher about the cardinals’ choice.

headline.main: Introducing Francis, the First Pope From the New World
